DOC.brief_summary: For thousands of years people in the South Pacific have used Atuna racemosa extract as a topical anti-inflammatory. We, the researchers at the Mayo Clinic, have shown this extract to also have antibacterial properties. While this extract has been used for decades in the South Pacific, a controlled clinical trial to evaluate toxicity has never been performed.
DOC.criteria: The subjects will be 20 healthy male and nonpregnant, nonlactating, female volunteers of ages 18 65. No subject will be excluded based on minority status.
